sentences.english: Yes, own home is quite poor family.

sentences.english: But in this case, is attack let own home not firm work.

sentences.english: Regional arts is the local art in bigger places.

sentences.english: I am a countryman born in a poor family and have been remembering my identity as a farmer.

sentences.english: MA Wu Cave River Flowing east into the sea from this township.
